sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Yup from 'yup'; const LoginPage = () => { const loginSchema = Yup.object().shape({ email: Yup.string() .email('Invalid email') .required('Required'), password: Yup.string() .min(2, 'Password must be 2 characters at minimum.') .max(10, 'Password must be 10 characters at maximum.') .required('Required'), }); return (
Remember Me
Forget Password?
Belum memiliki akun ? Daftar disini
) } export default LoginPage;
